## ItemBoxManager.register() method

Register a custom row

**Signature:**

```typescript
register(field: string, displayName: string, getFieldHook: typeof getFieldHookFunc | undefined, options?: {
        editable?: boolean;
        setFieldHook?: typeof setFieldHookFunc;
        index?: number;
        multiline?: boolean;
        collapsible?: boolean;
    }): Promise<void>;
```

</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>

field


</td><td>

string


</td><td>

Field name. Used in `getField` and `setField`<!-- -->.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

displayName


</td><td>

string


</td><td>

The row header display text.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

getFieldHook


</td><td>

typeof getFieldHookFunc \| undefined


</td><td>

Called when loading row content. If you registered the getField hook somewhere else (in ItemBox or FieldHooks), leave it undefined.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

options


</td><td>

{ editable?: boolean; setFieldHook?: typeof setFieldHookFunc; index?: number; multiline?: boolean; collapsible?: boolean; }
